summary: This is an email chain from June 21, 2019, between individuals in the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY). The subject is the sharing of documents, specifically the Florida Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) for Jeffrey Epstein, dated September 24, 2007. The emails show a request for the documents for review over a weekend.

persons.name: Geoff
persons.context: Mentioned as the person who wanted to review the Epstein NPA and related documents over the weekend.

events.title: Execution of Epstein's Florida NPA
events.description: The date of the Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) for Jeffrey Epstein, which is the document being requested and attached in the email chain.

events.title: SDNY Email Chain Requesting Epstein NPA
events.description: Email correspondence within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the SDNY discussing and transmitting the 2007 Florida Non-Prosecution Agreement for Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: United States Attorney's Office, SDNY (Southern District of New York)
keyFacts: The 2007 Florida Non-Prosecution Agreement (NPA) for Jeffrey Epstein was being circulated within the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York in June 2019.
The email chain indicates a request for the NPA and related documents (a prosecution memo and a decision) for review over a weekend.
The correspondence shows internal DOJ communication about a key document in the Epstein case years after its original signing.
